title: Eclipse eSports Season One Looking for Teams! [10/16] [Potential 100$ Prize Pool at 16 teams]
body:
Greetings, League Community!

I'm here looking for teams that'd be interested in registering for my first ever series. As the topic states, there is a potential prize pool of 100$. Potential meaning: My sponsor will only come through if sixteen teams register.

If you're looking for information on the series, click here: http://eclipseesportz.weebly.com/everything-regarding-the-series.html

If you want a direct register link, click here: http://events.na.leagueoflegends.com/events/141981#info

Or! If you'd like to join our teamspeak directly and speak with me, the IP is: c2gaming.typefrag.com

replies.body: I'd love to participate, but i don't have a team :\ do you have any suggestions or any other players in my situation? add me in-game please bamf_hydro
hello please add me in game i have questions. Enchatin is my IGN
bumppers. Looking for those last two teams!
Just noticed on the website it lists some games as already played? Has the tournament already started?

> [{quoted}](name=Scaythe,realm=NA,application-id=K6EGEal2,discussion-id=PiIW6gFP,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-09-06T18:09:46.426+0000)
>
> Just noticed on the website it lists some games as already played? Has the tournament already started?

Nope. Those are pre-split matches. To get the twitch and such ready.
Game day starts in just three days! We're currently at 13/16 teams, three slots left, don't be afraid in joining in on the action!
Can vouch. Profeesional enviroment cash pool. Competitive play.
D A N K  C O M M E N T
